messages.text: Hello BeyondChats üëã, I‚Äôm Nirmal ‚Äî here with my assignment submission and a whole lot of excitement!

messages.text:
Here‚Äôs my assignment for the React.js Developer role. I‚Äôve recreated your demo interface with a strong focus on clean UI, responsive design, and delightful micro-interactions. And yes ‚Äî AI tone variations included üòâ . üõ†Ô∏è Built With:
- React 18
- Context API
- Framer Motion
- TailwindCSS
- React Router DOM
Awesome tech stack! Have you hosted the project somewhere?

response.aiResponse: Where can we view your project live?
response.rephrase: Great choice of tools! Do you have a live demo we can check out?
response.myToneOfVoice: That‚Äôs a killer stack! Got a link we can check out?
response.moreFriendly: Wow, that stack sounds awesome! Where can we play with your app? üòÑ
response.moreFormal: Could you please share the deployment and repository links?
response.fixGrammar: Impressive tech stack! Have you hosted your project online?

messages.text:
üîó Absolutely! Here are the details:
üåê [Live Site](https://beyondchat-demo.netlify.app)
Brilliant! Anything else you‚Äôd like to highlight?

response.aiResponse: Anything else you'd like to share?
response.rephrase: Would you like to mention any other features or details?
response.myToneOfVoice: You‚Äôve got the floor! Anything cool we shouldn‚Äôt miss?
response.moreFriendly: Don't hold back! üòÑ Got anything else to show us?
response.moreFormal: Is there any additional information you'd like to provide?
response.fixGrammar: Great! Is there anything else you'd like to highlight?

messages.text: üí° I designed the UI to adapt across devices, added subtle transitions, and included a ‚ÄòRelated Articles‚Äô section that dynamically showcases AI responses and resources (like this oneüëá).

messages.text: Hi, I was charged twice for my subscription this month. Can you help me with a refund?
I'm sorry to hear that. Let me check your billing details and get back to you shortly.

response.aiResponse: Apologies for the inconvenience. I‚Äôll review your billing records now.
response.rephrase: I regret the inconvenience. I'll examine your billing details right away.
response.myToneOfVoice: Oops! That doesn‚Äôt sound right. Let me sort it out for you.
response.moreFriendly: Hang tight! I‚Äôll check your billing info and fix this üòä
response.moreFormal: I apologize for the inconvenience. I will investigate your billing records promptly.
response.fixGrammar: Let me check your billing details and get back to you.

messages.text: Sure, please let me know what you find.
Thanks for waiting. I can confirm the duplicate charge. I‚Äôve initiated your refund‚Äîit will reflect within 5‚Äì7 business days.

response.aiResponse: Confirmed duplicate payment. Refund started, expect it in 5‚Äì7 business days.
response.rephrase: The double billing has been verified. A refund is being processed.
response.myToneOfVoice: Good catch! The refund is rolling out ‚Äî check back in a few days!
response.moreFriendly: You were totally right! Refund‚Äôs on its way ‚Äî expect it soon üòä
response.moreFormal: The duplicate charge has been verified and a refund has been initiated. It should reflect within 5‚Äì7 days.
response.fixGrammar: I can confirm the duplicate charge. I‚Äôve initiated your refund‚Äîit will reflect within 5‚Äì7 business days.

messages.text: Great, thanks for your help!

relatedArticles.summary: Step-by-step process to request a refund from the billing section.

messages.text: Actually, now I can't log in from the mobile app.

messages.text: Can I switch to a yearly subscription instead of monthly?
Yes, you can change your plan anytime.

response.aiResponse: Absolutely! Switching plans is quick and easy.
response.rephrase: Sure, you may upgrade to a yearly plan at any time.
response.myToneOfVoice: Totally doable! Let‚Äôs set up your yearly plan.
response.moreFriendly: Of course! Switching to yearly is a great choice üòä
response.moreFormal: You are eligible to change to a yearly subscription at your convenience.
response.fixGrammar: Yes, you can change your plan anytime.

messages.text: Will I lose my data if I cancel my subscription?
No, your data will be saved even if you cancel.

response.aiResponse: Not at all! Your data remains safe after cancellation.
response.rephrase: You won‚Äôt lose any data, even after cancelling.
response.myToneOfVoice: No worries! Your info stays intact if you cancel.

response.moreFormal: Your data will remain securely stored following subscription cancellation.
response.fixGrammar: No, your data will be saved even if you cancel.

messages.text: How can I update my payment method?

messages.text: Can I pause my subscription instead of cancelling?
Yes, pausing your subscription is possible.

messages.text: I tried to make a payment but it failed. Can you help?
Sure! Sometimes this happens due to a network or card issue. Can you try again with a different method or browser?
